subject: Re: almost too embarassed to post this, but....
author: Allen
full_text:
I had the same problem.  I broke down and changed my setting so now I
 get individual emails from the group.  That solved the problem for me.  

Allen 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ourobouros2k2" <ourobouros2k2@...> wrote:
>
> Ok, when someone posts a non-stored embedded soundclip or video, I
> find it to be non-clickable. I am forced to run latest version of
> firefox, but at work with ie6 I have the same issue. How do I open
> these post attachments? I am sure the answer is painfully obvious, so
> here is a preemptive "d'oh!"
> 
> thanks
> Andy
>
